attributes.action: any immigrants that as commited a crime or planned on commiting a crime in the uk be deported from the uk
attributes.additional_details: i think that all immergrants that commit any  sort of crime within the UK or have been proven to be planning a crime (of any sort) within the UK or the world should be deported (lose the right to stay within the UK) so please sign our petition to show that the people of the UK will NOT stand for any sort of terrorism or illegal going ons in OUR country.
